product_name: Outdoor Products Power Pack Glide Daypack 2.0
long_description: Frequent fliers and overloaded travelers will enjoy the Outdoor Products Power Pack Glide 2.0 daypack, which offers loads of organization options and a checkpoint-friendly laptop storage sleeve.
